name: antigravity-awesome-skills
description: 900+ agentic skills for Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Cursor, Antigravity & more. Installer CLI.

scripts.chain: npm run validate && npm run index && npm run readme
scripts.build: npm run chain && npm run catalog
scripts.sync:all-official: npm run sync:microsoft && npm run chain
scripts.update:skills: node scripts/run-python.js scripts/generate_index.py && node scripts/copy-file.js skills_index.json web-app/public/skills.json
scripts.app:dev: npm run app:setup && cd web-app && npm run dev
scripts.app:build: npm run app:setup && cd web-app && npm run build
